items.name: init(start: Date, end: Date)
items.desc: Creates and returns a text provider with the specified start and end dates.

items.name: init(start: Date, end: Date, timeZone: TimeZone?)
items.desc: Creates and returns a text provider with the specified dates and time zone information.

items.name: var startDate: Date
items.desc: The start date for the time interval.

items.name: var endDate: Date
items.desc: The end date for the time interval.

items.name: var timeZone: TimeZone?
items.desc: The time zone used to format time values.
